headline: Melius Sets $135 Target on Marvell (MRVL) as Custom Silicon Demand Accelerates
summary: Marvell Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MRVL) is included among the 13 Best January Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On January 5, Melius Research upgraded Marvell Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MRVL) to Buy from Hold and set a $135 price target. The analyst noted that the stock is down about 11% from its recent intraday high. From their perspective, Marvell’s […]

headline: Is Surging AI Custom Silicon Demand Reshaping the Investment Case for Marvell Technology (MRVL)?
summary: In early January 2026, Marvell Technology reported strong momentum in its AI-focused custom silicon business, with AI XPU offerings and custom ASICs driving robust data center revenue growth and attracting major hyperscaler customers such as Alphabet, Amazon, and Microsoft. The company’s growing pipeline of AI XPU and XPU-attach design wins, alongside expectations that custom silicon will contribute a meaningful share of data center revenues, has reinforced views of Marvell as a key AI...

headline: Finland Colocation Data Center Portfolio Analysis Report 2025-2029: Pure Data Center, FCDC Corp, QTS and Hyperco Leads the Upcoming Market with More than 3W
summary: Analyze the Finland data center market with our comprehensive Excel database product. Gain detailed insights into 25 existing and 31 upcoming colocation data centers across key locations like Helsinki and Espoo, including analysis of white-floor space, IT load capacity, and colocation pricing. Discover Finland's dominance in the upcoming data center market, with over 3GW, driven by major players like Pure Data Center and FCDC Corp, and influential tech giants Microsoft and Google. Ideal for REIT

headline: CallTower Wins 2025 BIG Awards for Business for Operator Connect for Microsoft Teams

headline: Tolion Health AI Appoints Global Health & AI Leader Gregory J. Moore, MD, PhD, to Board of Directors
summary: BOSTON, January 06, 2026--Tolion Health AI, a digital health company developing artificial intelligence solutions for personalized, predictive, and preventive brain-health guidance, today announced the appointment of Gregory J. Moore, MD, PhD, to its Board of Directors.
